name: capstone-api

scripts.start: knex migrate:rollback && knex migrate:latest && knex seed:run && node ./src/index.js
scripts.start:dev: export NODE_ENV=development && npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && nodemon --watch ./ ./src/index.js

author: Avery Pears, Eric Sheridan, Matthew Greenup, Miguel Castro, Nicholas Sexton, and Pariss Youngblood
